author: Nerd of the Rings
description:
At Dragonsteel Nexus, I had the chance to sit down with author @BrandSanderson to chat about the works of J.R.R. Tolkien, the Fantasy genre, and his most important thing for a potential Cosmere film adaptation!

For more on Brandon's books, including INCREDIBLE leatherbound editions, visit: https://www.dragonsteelbooks.com/

If you've never read Brandon's books, do yourself a favor and give Mistborn (fantasy/sci-fi) or The Way of Kings (high fantasy) a try!

Mistborn Trilogy: https://amzn.to/4gHOofE
The Way of Kings: https://amzn.to/4iFu4xt

#brandonsanderson #cosmere #tolkien
title: Brandon Sanderson talks Tolkien, Fantasy, & Potential Cosmere Adaptations!
